message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.CV. 

The paper discusses a novel method for reinforcement learning agents to discover their own questions, which is a topic related to machine learning and artificial intelligence. The use of non-myopic meta-gradients and general value functions also suggests a focus on learning and optimization, which are common themes in the sub-categories of cs.LG and cs.AI. The application of the method to Atari 2600 videogames also suggests a focus on computer vision and image processing, which are relevant to the sub-category of cs.CV. The use of actor-critic agents and the improvement of data efficiency also suggest a focus on robotics and control, which are relevant to the sub-category of cs.RO. Overall, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG and cs.AI, followed by cs.RO, cs.SY, and cs.CV.
